shapes
Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
  shapes.Shape
      shapes.Shape2D
          shapes.Rectangle

public class Rectangle
extends Shape2D

Represents a rectangle defined by its color, width and height, and x and y coordinates.

Version:
9/27/15
Author:
Ashley Helfinstein

Constructor Detail

Rectangle

public Rectangle(int x,
                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h)
Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the top left corner of the rectangle at x,y.

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
y - the y coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
w - the width of the rectangle
h - the height of the rectangle

draw

public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.

Overrides:
draw in class Shape
Parameters:
drawer - the PApplet that can draw the rectangle on the screen
Postcondition:
Drawer has some state changes. See draw method in Shape superclass.
